formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Allele frequencies from genotype counts: $$ p = \frac{2 \cdot n_{AA} + n_{Aa}}{2N}, \quad q = 1 - p, \quad N = n_{AA} + n_{Aa} + n_{aa} $$ Expected genotype frequencies under HWE: $$ P(AA) = p^2, \quad P(Aa) = 2pq, \quad P(aa) = q^2 $$ Expected counts (given N): $$ E(AA) = N p^2,\quad E(Aa) = N \cdot 2pq,\quad E(aa) = N q^2 $$ Pearson chi-square test statistic: $$ \chi^2 = \sum_{g \in \{AA,Aa,aa\}} \frac{(O_g - E_g)^2}{E_g}, \quad \text{df} = 1 \text{ when } p \text{ is estimated} $$
